data.message: I want to let you know that this allysa Mae Gomez is harassing me in Facebook want to block her acount

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Trixie. If you feel you're in immediate danger, please contact your local authorities. Depending on the seriousness of the situation, you can learn more about the tools Facebook offers to help you deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/2skMsX5. You can also find more information, tools and resources on our Bullying Prevention Hub here: http://bit.ly/2sldvkX. -Brittany
All I want is you block her account so that she will no longer post my pic.with my daughter
If you want you will see what her post I'm talking about here is alyssa Mae gomez

Hey Trixie. If someone is downloading your photos, altering them, and re-posting them on Facebook, please let us know and we will take them down. Follow these steps to report the photo: http://bit.ly/2s5gA4s. Additionally, you can learn how to block someone on Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2s5P072. -Brittany
I already block her but one of my friend saw what she is saying about me with my photo
Here is the photo that I'm saying
I already report it using my other account Laarni Soberano Garcia
So try to help me block her account name alyssa Mae gomez
We appreciate your patience while we review your report. Please keep in mind it's against Facebook Community Standards to maintain more than one personal profile: http://bit.ly/2sqobd1. -Brittany
Yes I know but I created that other account just because. This account is just hack by some one a year ago
